This account bears the admin role (for the granted role). Expected in cases where the role was granted using the internal {AccessControl-_grantRole}."},"RoleRevoked(bytes32,address,address)":{"details":"Emitted when `account` is revoked `role`. `sender` is the account that originated the contract call:   - if using `revokeRole`, it is the admin role bearer   - if using `renounceRole`, it is the role bearer (i.e. `account`)"},"Unpaused(address)":{"details":"Emitted when the pause is lifted by `account`."},"Upgraded(address)":{"details":"Emitted when the implementation is upgraded."}},"kind":"dev","methods":{"getRoleAdmin(bytes32)":{"details":"Returns the admin role that controls `role`. See {grantRole} and {revokeRole}. To change a role's admin, use {_setRoleAdmin}."},"grantRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Grants `role` to `account`. If `account` had not been already granted `role`, emits a {RoleGranted} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleGranted} event."},"hasRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Returns `true` if `account` has been granted `role`."},"pause()":{"details":"Only the PAUSER role can call this function."},"pauseVault(address)":{"details":"Only the PAUSER role can call this function.Only registered assets can be paused.","params":{"asset":"The address of the asset."}},"paused()":{"details":"Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise."},"proxiableUUID()":{"details":"Implementation of the ERC-1822 {proxiableUUID} function. This returns the storage slot used by the implementation. It is used to validate the implementation's compatibility when performing an upgrade. IMPORTANT: A proxy pointing at a proxiable contract should not be considered proxiable itself, because this risks bricking a proxy that upgrades to it, by delegating to itself until out of gas. Thus it is critical that this function revert if invoked through a proxy. This is guaranteed by the `notDelegated` modifier."},"renounceRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Revokes `role` from the calling account. Roles are often managed via {grantRole} and {revokeRole}: this function's purpose is to provide a mechanism for accounts to lose their privileges if they are compromised (such as when a trusted device is misplaced). If the calling account had been revoked `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must be `callerConfirmation`. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event."},"revokeRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Revokes `role` from `account`. If `account` had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event."},"setCollateralAssetStatus(address,bool)":{"details":"Only the manager role can call this function.Only registered assets can be set as bad collateral.If set to true, minting will be disabled for the asset.","params":{"_isBadCollateral":"The status of the asset.","asset":"The address of the asset."}},"setFeeReceiver(address)":{"details":"Only the default admin role can call this function.Reverts if the fee receiver address is zero address.","params":{"_feeReceiver":"The address of the fee receiver."}},"setPOLFeeCollector(address)":{"details":"Only the default admin role can call this function.Reverts if the POL Fee Collector address is zero address.","params":{"_polFeeCollector":"The address of the POL Fee Collector."}},"supportsInterface(bytes4)":{"details":"See {IERC165-supportsInterface}."},"unpause()":{"details":"only the MANAGER role can call this function."},"unpauseVault(address)":{"details":"Only the MANAGER role can call this function.Only registered assets can be unpaused.","params":{"asset":"The address of the asset."}},"upgradeToAndCall(address,bytes)":{"custom:oz-upgrades-unsafe-allow-reachable":"delegatecall","details":"Upgrade the implementation of the proxy to `newImplementation`, and subsequently execute the function call encoded in `data`. b878a10892384badddb7520bdf67a44cdc1e6a04f9ae3699402344ff26df","dweb:/ipfs/QmS49Xuo1iED9EXowDmF2QSqa8cJ7tQ72n7wQMqeVEzLXP"]},"src/v0_Contracts/CollateralVault_V0.sol":{"keccak256":"0xe2c72e096de999d047fc5c36dfb5f9d647bbd348d77c1e7fb7d4fd333f320ec8","license":"BUSL-1.1","urls":["bzz-raw://d6a9fb30cdab58e82589f9281f4a4ef2f23f5fe2ac5428bf73d6b3da14721747","dweb:/ipfs/QmYoSFKYNkPA55JnhubjDzGYiMwk7HuYwqVtJVKk8QEyD1"]},"src/v0_Contracts/VaultAdmin_V0.sol":{"keccak256":"0xe20d2935efb27e4c20af1c4130d80bbfe343d33f82217eda9386465171438495","license":"BUSL-1.1","urls":["bzz-raw://30c2c65a8d894906bead085eab3b5040667254841d73c2be966b51d0f279282e","dweb:/ipfs/QmXTjSTkaSUD5351fo8VfCTofmvX6X7sFp1kL16GRgpNNK"]}},"version":1}

getRoleAdmin(bytes32).details: Returns the admin role that controls `role`. See {grantRole} and {revokeRole}. To change a role's admin, use {_setRoleAdmin}.

grantRole(bytes32,address).details: Grants `role` to `account`. If `account` had not been already granted `role`, emits a {RoleGranted} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleGranted} event.

pause().details: Only the PAUSER role can call this function.

pauseVault(address).details: Only the PAUSER role can call this function.Only registered assets can be paused.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

proxiableUUID().details: Implementation of the ERC-1822 {proxiableUUID} function. This returns the storage slot used by the implementation. It is used to validate the implementation's compatibility when performing an upgrade. IMPORTANT: A proxy pointing at a proxiable contract should not be considered proxiable itself, because this risks bricking a proxy that upgrades to it, by delegating to itself until out of gas. Thus it is critical that this function revert if invoked through a proxy. This is guaranteed by the `notDelegated` modifier.

renounceRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from the calling account. Roles are often managed via {grantRole} and {revokeRole}: this function's purpose is to provide a mechanism for accounts to lose their privileges if they are compromised (such as when a trusted device is misplaced). If the calling account had been revoked `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must be `callerConfirmation`. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event.

revokeRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from `account`. If `account` had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event.

setCollateralAssetStatus(address,bool).details: Only the manager role can call this function.Only registered assets can be set as bad collateral.If set to true, minting will be disabled for the asset.

setFeeReceiver(address).details: Only the default admin role can call this function.Reverts if the fee receiver address is zero address.

params._feeReceiver: The address of the fee receiver.

setPOLFeeCollector(address).details: Only the default admin role can call this function.Reverts if the POL Fee Collector address is zero address.

params._polFeeCollector: The address of the POL Fee Collector.

unpause().details: only the MANAGER role can call this function.

unpauseVault(address).details: Only the MANAGER role can call this function.Only registered assets can be unpaused.

upgradeToAndCall(address,bytes).details: Upgrade the implementation of the proxy to `newImplementation`, and subsequently execute the function call encoded in `data`. Calls {_authorizeUpgrade}. Emits an {Upgraded} event.

withdrawAllFees(address).details: It loops over all the registered assets and withdraws the collected fees.

collectedFees(address,address).notice: Mapping of receiver to asset to collected fee.

feeReceiver().notice: The address of the fee receiver.

pauseVault(address).notice: Pause the vault for a given asset.

polFeeCollector().notice: The address of the POL Fee Collector.

setCollateralAssetStatus(address,bool).notice: Set the bad collateral status of an asset.

setPOLFeeCollector(address).notice: Set the POL Fee Collector address.

unpauseVault(address).notice: Unpause the vault for a given asset.

vaults(address).notice: Mapping of assets to their corresponding vaults.

withdrawAllFees(address).notice: Withdraw all the collected fees for a `receiver`.

withdrawFee(address,address).notice: Withdraw the collected fees for a `receiver` for a specific `asset`.
